resources.string: Don\'t have an account? register here.
Please enter your Email address number and National ID.
The vx 520 comes with both the options to use GPS(usage of a sim card)
The POS Machine comes with a roll of printing paper for your connivance and if in the need for more go to you local branch or CABS central ave Harare
The vx 520 comes with a battery that is fitted at the bottom of the POS machine
The vx 675 comes with a base. Its recommended to charger the POS machine through this base in order to avoid a Temper due to power surge either from a generator or normal electricity flow
The POS machine comes with a charger that you connect to the charger and if ever damaged please return to CABS Central avenue for a free replacement
The xv 675 comes with a casing that always you to carry it with ease if you are always on the go
The vx 675 comes in two Models Wifi and GPS(usage of a sim card)

When issued with a VeriFone VX 520 it should be accompanied by the adapter in the picture to your left.When adapter is damaged or you fear its not working anymore please bring to Cabs Central Ave for replacement.
This tutorial describes how to fix a \"Please try again ND\" error
This tutorial describes how to fix a \"Please try again NA\" error
This tutorial describes how you settle transactions on your POS machine
This tutorial describes how to fix a \"Please try again CA\" error
This tutorial describes how to fix a \"Clear Batch\" error
This tutorial describes how to fix a \"Please try again CE\" error
This tutorial describes how to fix any issues you get from your printer
Q: What should I do when I see my POS machine Charger is no longer working?
A: Feel free to visit central avenue to get a free replacement and please avoid using chargers that were not issued by the CABS team.
Q: When my POS machine reads a message \"Security temper… Enter Password\" what should i do?
A: Temper normally happens when you use your POS machine on generator current or try to access settings you are not authorised to in this event please bring it to Central Avenue CABS for replacement
Q: What causes my POS machine to freeze during use?

A: It is recommended that the user of the machine settle the transactions done by the POS at the end of every day so as to free memory within the machine as it doesn\'t have a larger capacity to keep all your transaction
Q: Can my customers pay using Ecocash on my CABS POS machine?

A: It\'s as easy as entering your clients number on the main menu and inputting the amount they are being charged and a prompt will be received on their mobile device asking them to enter their Ecocash pin
Welcome to CABS POS machine service!
